column1: I absolutely loved this movie! The acting was phenomenal and the story was gripping.
This was a complete waste of time. The plot was boring and the characters were uninteresting.
An amazing cinematic experience! Visually stunning and emotionally moving.
Terrible movie. I couldn't finish it because it was so dull and predictable.
A solid movie with great performances, though the ending felt rushed.
Awful. Just awful. The dialogue made no sense and the pacing was terrible.
One of the best films I've seen this year! Highly recommend it.
Mediocre at best. The concept was interesting but poorly executed.
Fantastic! The soundtrack, the visuals, everything was perfect.
I didn't like this movie at all. It felt like a waste of my time.
